# Score analysis

```{r}
library(gsheet)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)

# load functions
lapply(
  list.files("./R", full.names = TRUE),
  source
)


df <- gsheet2tbl('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1K600qeRyYevSrMBUyevP4sZ4vRIBzq4ggCl3cLjHAvc#gid=2096833443')

```
